properties.Observatio: A water storage tank has been constructed that is 4.4m long, 4.4m wide and 5.0m deep. The tank is leaking water in some places. About 115 families use water. Water should be purified. The water distribution system is in dilapidated condition.
properties.Descriptio:
Repairs to the existing storage tanks

Scarifying existing or concrete surface

properties.Observatio: A water tank is constructed using concrete rings. About 70 families use water. Water should be purified. The water distribution system is in dilapidated condition.
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of the water Transmission line

Excavation in trenches less than 300mm width in normal earth average depth of not exceeding 1.0m from ground level inclusive of back filling, compacting and disposal of surplus earth for the transmission line

properties.Observatio: Currently, a concrete pit has been constructed and PVC pipe used to supply drinking water to about 12 families. The water is in very dirty condition. A water storage tank has been constructed at a low location and is in a completely dilapidated condition
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of the water tank & Filtering arrangement

Providing the filter media

Construction of Concrete water storage tank of 20 cum - size internal t 3mx3mx2.5

Miscel
